DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long term safety efficacy FTY720 combine cyclosporine corticosteroid patient receive kidney organ transplant
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Efficacy Safety FTY720 de Novo Adult Renal Transplant Recipients
